item.title: Setting Up GitLabs
item.description: Overview This post will document my process in setting up GitLabs. Prerequisites Navigate to the host on gitlab page. Have familiarity with Git versioning Create a GitLab account Complete Hugo Quick Start Completing the hugo quick start turtorial will produce a local, ready to publish, Hugo website. If this has not been completed, take a look at my Setting Up Hugo page for more information. Creating A GitLab Account Navigate to the gitlab home page.
